data.name: Sheep in Dreams
data.detailed_description:
New Releases

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1731200
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1826160


About the Game

Sheep in Dreams is a Roguelike RPG developed by Cham Project, published by OTAKU Plan.

STORY

One day, mysterious sheep began to appear in Hitsuji-chan's house!
And strange things happen around everyone in the city...

When you dream, you can enter the dream dungeon.
Let's capture the dream dungeon and solve the mysterious phenomenon!

Find the keys and doors dropped somewhere on the map and move on!

Every weapon has its own unique skill!

Use these skills to defeat EPIC bosses

FEATURE

  • Action game
  • Roguelike
  • Map exploring

data.short_description: One day, mysterious sheep began to appear in Hitsuji-chan's house! And strange things happen around everyone in the city... When you dream, you can enter the dream dungeon. Let's capture the dream dungeon and solve the mysterious phenomenon!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes in the game will appear sexually suggestive content that is not suitable for minors; Please decide whether to play or not.
